alert.note: Alert for Ketchikan Gateway Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 18 at 7:35AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Near The Ward Lake Recreational Area. * WHEN...Until 730 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 734 AM AKDT, the dam operator reported flooding in areas near the Ward Lake recreational area.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
